spec_data.Name: gossip
spec_data.Description:
Small and fast logging provider for SLF4j with following features.
* Small footprint ~75k (even smaller for gossip-bootstrap-slf4j ~20K)
* Profile-based configuration
* Profile activation triggers
* Multiple source inputs
* Console and rolling file listeners
* ANSI color rendering
* Internal logging
* SLF4j support, helpers and utilities
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Wed 26 Jul 2017 01:59:48 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Small and fast logging provider for SLF4j
